---
title: '[Solved] Your device is missing important security and quality fixes'
date: 2020-01-02T22:11:00+01:00
draft: false
---

Your device is missing important security and quality fixes
-----------------------------------------------------------

Issue:  
In Windows 10 update window you get the following error and cannot update:  
Your device is missing important security and quality fixes  
  
Solution:  
Uninstall the latest System update and check for updates again. The error will disappear. The error was caused by a mal-installed update the last time the system updated.  
  
  
In alternative, upgrade to latest version (at the time of writing 1909) by using the following link:  
  
[https://www.microsoft.com/en-in/software-download/windows10](https://www.microsoft.com/en-in/software-download/windows10)  
![](data:image/png;base64,)
